label: Description
value: The printed form; the blanks in the center never filled in. Five printed verses in German in horizontal rectangular frames. Date and maker's name below. Angels, type I, upper left and right. A putti with a horn, above center. United States eagle below center, and birds on branches lower left and right. Blocks printed in black, colored by hand.

label: Physical description
value: Calligraphy in brown ink, brush and watercolor on paper
